full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Project Title: F3065-221927 Exhaust Gas Silencer Procurement - CCGS Des Groseilliers
### Tender Number: WS3815289728-Doc3815380191

This document announces a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of exhaust gas silencers, expansion joints, and exhaust gas gaskets for the CCGS Des Groseilliers. 

**Overview:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of 6 new exhaust gas silencers, 6 expansion joints and a total of 18 exhaust gas gaskets. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the specified components to 101 boul. Champlain, Quebec City, Quebec.

**Important Dates:**

* Publication Date: January 27, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 23, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 28, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 16, 2023

**Selection Criteria:**

The RFP will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Additional Information:**

* The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The Request for Proposal is being issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and open to bids from qualified suppliers across Canada.
* The bid submission deadline is February 23, 2023, at 14:00 EST, and late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting entity for this RFP is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the project is sponsored by the Canadian Coast Guard.

**Contact Information:**

If you have any inquiries regarding this RFP, please contact Gabriel Piras, PSPC/SPAC, at gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Related Documents:**

The Request for Proposal document and its annexes can be found on the Ariba Discovery website. 
* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15246222?extsite=MTUyNDYyMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that all interested suppliers must create an Ariba Discovery supplier account to access the RFP documents and submit their bids.
